message: Bob, I'm offering you my product for $900,000. It's a fantastic deal for you, considering its value to you. Let me know what you think!
I appreciate your offer, Alice, but I was thinking more along the lines of $750,000. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to stay within my budget. What do you think?

Bob, I appreciate your counteroffer, but $750,000 is simply too low. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but $850,000 is the lowest I can go.  This price still leaves you with a great deal considering the value to you. Let's make this happen!
I understand your position, Alice, but $850,000 is still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to compromise, but I can only go up to $820,000. Can you meet me at this price?
